channel.title: Whonix KVM issues on Linux
channel.description:
I installed kvm and went through the steps on whonix wiki kvm section. When I start virt-manager in terminal whonix gateway and workstation show up, but when I try to start the virtual machines I get this error.
Error starting domain: Requested operation is not valid: blkio device weight is valid only for bfq or cfq scheduler
any help would be appreciated

item.title: Whonix KVM issues on Linux
item.dc:creator: LordNikkon
item.description:
I installed kvm and went through the steps on whonix wiki kvm section. When I start virt-manager in terminal whonix gateway and workstation show up, but when I try to start the virtual machines I get this error.

any help would be appreciated
